Event.EventName: Your childhood friend mentioned that their mother is in hospital, do you go see her?

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Go visit her, it must be very lonely in hospital.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: She is very happy to see a friendly face although she doesn't seem too well and is coughing alot. A passing nurse tells you no visitors are allowed right now and escorts you to the entrance.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Decide not to go see her right now.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: Visiters aren't allowed right now anyway, although it would have been nice to see her.
